publication.abstract: Â© 2014 The Author.RAREMETAL is a computationally efficient tool for meta-analysis of rare variants genotyped using sequencing or arrays. RAREMETAL facilitates analyses of individual studies, accommodates a variety of input file formats, handles related and unrelated individuals, executes both single variant and burden tests and performs conditional association analyses.
publication.title: RAREMETAL: Fast and powerful meta-analysis for rare variants

summary.description: Program that facilitates the meta-analysis of rare variants from genotype arrays or sequencing.
summary.name: RAREMETAL
